body.name: K&ZZ 64GB 5 Pack USB Flash Drives with Lanyard 64G Small USB Drive Ultra Fit Flash Drives Mini Thumb Drive 64 GB Micro USB 2.0 Pen Drive, Blue

features: 🍁Portable & Practical Design - Extremely compact and low-profile design of 64GB flash drive so that it can long stay to remain connected to PC or laptop for maximum convenience. The seamless fit design can prevent loss and can take to anywhere with the device.

🍁Expand Your Memory - Mini size and large capacity of USB flash drives add extra storge for you. Leave it in your laptops, desktop, smart TV, embroidery machine, car audio systems, and used as like a solid state drive.

🍁Reliable Quality - With built-in A+ high quality chip, stable and stay-put storage, to protect your private and important files. Made of zinc alloy and ABS material, small USB drive not easy to get bent or broken off. Multiple protection includes water proof, shock proof, magnetic proof, dust proof.

🍁Wide Compatibility - Plug and play, no need to install any software. Mini USB flash drives support Windows 7/ 8/ 10/ Vista/ XP/ 2000/ ME/ NT Linux and MacOs 10.3 and above. It is your great data storage and transfer companion with traveling and working.

🍁Service Warranty - All USB memory stick of K&ZZ have been tested rigorously before shipping. We will provide 12 month warranty and life-time friendly customer service that our customers buy our small thumb drive with confidence.

K&ZZ 64GB 5 Pack USB Flash Drives with Lanyard Plug in and stay, safely stays there-nothing to stick out or break off.Reliable and secure storage for your photos, videos, music, and files.Small flash drive with a lanyard, files stay secure, anywhere you go.Save time to upload files, make life and work easy.With Generous Storage, one 64GB small USB drive, it can hold over 3600+ 10 megapixel photos, 160 minutes+ 1080P video, 4000+ songs and 16GB office files.Perfect for all occasions gifts, such as Mother's Day, Father's Day, Wedding, Anniversary, Party, Photographer gifts, it can save some meaningful photos and videos.

Ultra Slim Design, Plug in and Stay Extra storage in a seamlessly fitting design. High-performance USB drive fits snugly into your host devices, you won’t bother to insert and eject this mini USB flash drive back in forth, “Coin” mini size make it stay plugged in and doesn't interfere with any case or bag, which makes it a powerful convenient external storage drive for laptops, car audio system, dash cams, TV, etc. Please Notes: 64GB thumb drive transfer speed performance may vary by capacities depending on host device, file attributes and other factors.Each storage device has a reserved memory for formatting and other functions. Actual capacity of 64GB: approximately 58.0 - 59.5GB.

Great Compatibility 64GB USB flash drives can be used on PC, Mac, laptop, printer, projector, car audio, game console, smart TV and sewing machine. It is your great data storage and transfer companion with traveling and working. Stable and Durable Tiny USB memory stick 64GB made of zinc alloy and ABS material, not easy to get bent or broken off, durable and lightweight . With built-in A+ chip, short thumb drive shows a stable USB 2.0 performance. Lanyard Design The hole at the end of the mini flash drives is designed for a lanyard and convenient to carry everywhere. Attached a small lanyard which makes it more obvious to be noticed, so that you can track or remove it easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Important to note, these are a great value and very compact

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and works fine for car music
reviews.reviewText: wanted short USBs for my music in my car - less likely to accidently break off like the larger ones.now no reason to buy the faster more expensive ones - these work fine ;-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Took longer to show up than wanted but nice and small and easy to send.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The size is great
reviews.reviewText: I bought these as recovery drives for the various computers in the house. The compact size is perfect to stow away until needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Music in Car
reviews.reviewText: Put 3,000 songs on each one and put them in both cars. Work great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars One of two failed after couple of uses, within 2 months of purchase
reviews.reviewText: I barely used one of these on two occasions to load up a bunch of MP3s for my car. After loading, I set it aside for a month. Went back to check it and it refuses to be recognized on two different laptops I have. Windows Disk Management sees the device but can't access it for me to try a reformat. SHould I bother to trust the other one that came with it? Not for any critical data. I should have spent a little more and got a name brand. Half-waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adequate for a few media files; be sure you don't get one too large for your device (32GB)
reviews.reviewText: There are many reviews complaining these don't work in embedded devices, but they're using 64+ GB disks. I specifically chose these 32GBs as the upper-limit to the CD player in the car.Write speed is low as others will mention. Some day 1MB/s, I see more than that but I see a bunch of big writes and big pauses. This is NOT the worst flash drive I've ever owned for write speed. It will be slower than uploading something, yes. Speed will go up and down inconsistently. Be sure to only let 1 thing write at a time, pause other copies or wait or use a file copy manager. See pic for what not to do, see up and down graphs.Putting this in a Kenwood CD player, on Shuffle All (shuffle folder & track), skips "instantly" to the next track, like quicker than a CD changing track. This is sufficient read speed for a few MP3s.I can't speak to the fake capacity issues others are having, I've written 29GB to this without noticing an overwrite loop yet. I can't speak to longevity, but I appreciate the other reviewers mentioning short-term failure. I'll be sure to use these for recreational things only, not as backups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works only in laptops
reviews.reviewText: I specifically got these to play music in my car and the car is not reading it. It is read in all my laptops. Disappointed that it didn't work in my car and that's 3 stars. Works well otherwise.
